statements: SELECT course_name, instructor, start_time, end_time FROM CourseSchedule;
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM CourseSchedule WHERE room_id = 101 ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor, room_name, building_name FROM CourseSchedule JOIN RoomAssignments ON CourseSchedule.room_id = RoomAssignments.room_id;
SELECT DISTINCT instructor FROM CourseSchedule ORDER BY instructor ASC;
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule WHERE instructor='John Doe' ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor, room_name FROM CourseSchedule JOIN RoomAssignments ON CourseSchedule.room_id = RoomAssignments.room_id WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY course_name ASC;

SELECT course_name, start_time, end_time, building_name FROM CourseSchedule JOIN RoomAssignments ON CourseSchedule.room_id = RoomAssignments.room_id WHERE building_name='Main Building' ORDER BY start_time;
SELECT course_name, instructor, start_time FROM CourseSchedule WHERE instructor='Jane Smith' OR instructor='Alice Johnson' ORDER BY start_time ASC, course_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(course_id) AS total_courses, instructor FROM CourseSchedule GROUP BY instructor ORDER BY total_courses DESC;
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule
SELECT course_name, start_date FROM CourseSchedule
SELECT end_date, course_name FROM CourseSchedule
SELECT * FROM RoomAssignment
SELECT room_name, available_capacity FROM RoomAssignment
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule WHERE course_id = 1 AND start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, end_date FROM CourseSchedule ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT room_id, room_name, available_capacity FROM RoomAssignment WHERE available_capacity >= 20 ORDER BY room_name ASC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, start_date, end_date FROM CourseSchedule INNER JOIN RoomAssignment ON CourseSchedule.course_id = RoomAssignment.room_id;
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule WHERE end_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, course_duration FROM courses WHERE course_duration > 10;
SELECT schedule_date, course_name, room_number FROM schedule JOIN courses ON schedule.course_id = courses.course_id JOIN rooms ON schedule.room_id = rooms.room_id;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_description ILIKE '%beginner%';
SELECT * FROM rooms WHERE room_capacity >= 20;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT course_name, course_duration FROM courses ORDER BY course_duration DESC;
SELECT course_name, room_number FROM courses JOIN schedule ON courses.course_id = schedule.course_id JOIN rooms ON schedule.room_id = rooms.room_id WHERE course_duration > 10;
SELECT DISTINCT course_name, room_capacity FROM courses JOIN schedule ON courses.course_id = schedule.course_id JOIN rooms ON schedule.room_id = rooms.room_id WHERE room_capacity >= 30;

SELECT course_name, room_capacity, schedule_date FROM courses JOIN schedule ON courses.course_id = schedule.course_id JOIN rooms ON schedule.room_id = rooms.room_id WHERE schedule_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM Course WHERE instructor_name='John Doe';
SELECT class_title, start_date, end_date FROM Class WHERE room_id = 101 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT instructor_name, experience_years FROM Instructor WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT room_number, capacity FROM Room WHERE capacity >= 30 ORDER BY room_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM Course WHERE schedule_time > '12:00:00';
SELECT room_number, capacity FROM Room WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY room_number DESC;
SELECT c.class_title, cr.room_number, cr.capacity, i.instructor_name FROM Class c JOIN Room cr ON c.room_id = cr.room_id JOIN Instructor i ON c.instructor_id = i.instructor_id;
SELECT c.course_name, i.instructor_name, i.experience_years FROM Course c JOIN Instructor i ON c.instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM CourseSchedule WHERE room_number = 101;
SELECT course_name, schedule_time FROM CourseSchedule WHERE schedule_time > '2022-01-01 12:00:00';
SELECT course_id, course_name, room_number FROM CourseSchedule WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT student_id, student_name, age FROM Student WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 25;
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, schedule_time FROM CourseSchedule ORDER BY schedule_time DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM CourseSchedule WHERE room_number = 101;

SELECT registration_date, student_name, course_name FROM CourseRegistration JOIN Student ON CourseRegistration.student_id = Student.student_id JOIN CourseSchedule ON CourseRegistration.course_id = CourseSchedule.course_id;
SELECT specialization, COUNT(instructor_id) AS total_instructors FROM Instructor GROUP BY specialization ORDER BY total_instructors DESC;
